# Web SDK Examples: Forms

> These are interactive Nutrient Playground examples. Click any link to try the code in your browser.
> 
> For local runnable examples, see [web/annotation/INDEX.md](../../web/annotation/INDEX.md).

---

## Forms

- [Add a user role dropdown to signature form fields](https://nutrient.io/playground?%252BPG9wdGlvbiB2YWx1ZT1cIlRlbmFudFwiPlRlbmFudDwvb3B0aW9uPjwvc2VsZWN0PjwvbGFiZWw%252BPC9kaXY%252BPC9kaXY%252BPC9kaXY%252BJztcbi8vRXZlbnQgbGlzdGVuZXIgdG8gY2hlY2sgd2hlaHRlciB0aGUgY2xpY2tlZCBhbm5vdGF0aW9uIGlzIGEgU2lnbmF0dXJlIFdpZGdldFxuaW5zdGFuY2UuYWRkRXZlbnRMaXN0ZW5lcignYW5ub3RhdGlvbnMucHJlc3MnLChhc3luYyBldmVudD0%%%%252FLnVzZXJSb2xlfSBmb3IgQW5ub3RhdGlvbjogJHthbm5vdGF0aW9uLmdldCgwKS5pZH1gKX0pKX0pKTsiLCJtb2RlIjoic3RhbmRhbG9uZSJ9)
  - Enhance form creator mode by adding a custom dropdown to assign user roles to signature fields. This demo focuses on UI enhancements, dynamically displaying the dropdown when a signature field is selected. — [Video](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=F3jx7kWNnMI)

- [Add custom form fields](https://nutrient.io/playground?%%%253D)
  - Dynamically create form fields with unique IDs and custom data when a user interacts with a toolbar button. — [Video](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=42kpjqLoVYo)

- [Add name to signature field](https://www.nutrient.io/playground?%)
  - Create signature form fields and display the creator’s name next to them. — [Video](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=-LeAvQTuUFg)

- [Add custom database form fields](https://nutrient.io/playground?%)
  - Modify the form creation modal to include buttons for mapping input fields to database fields, allowing users to update the form’s custom data. — [Video](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=RppsQeOCfis)

- [Iterate over form fields and widgets and output their properties](https://nutrient.io/playground?%%252BaXQgaW5zdGFuY2VvZiBQU1BERktpdC5Bbm5vdGF0aW9ucy5XaWRnZXRBbm5vdGF0aW9uKSkpKSkpLmZsYXRNYXAoKHBhZ2VBbm5vdGF0aW9ucz0%252BcGFnZUFubm90YXRpb25zLnRvQXJyYXkoKSkpO1xuLy8gUmV0cmlldmUgYWxsIHdpZGdldCBhbm5vdGF0aW9ucyBpbiB0aGUgZG9jdW1lbnQuXG5mb3JtRmllbGRzLmZsYXRNYXAoKGZvcm1GaWVsZD0%%253D%253D)

- [Set radio button and checkbox values](https://www.nutrient.io/playground?%252BIHtcbiAgICBjb25zb2xlLmVycm9yKFwiRXJyb3IgbG9hZGluZyBOdXRyaWVudDpcIiwgZXJyb3IpOyAvLyBMb2cgYW55IGVycm9ycyB0aGF0IG9jY3VyIGR1cmluZyBQU1BERktpdCBsb2FkaW5nXG4gIH0pO1xuIiwiY3NzIjoiLyogQWRkIHlvdXIgQ1NTIGhlcmUgKi9cbiJ9)
  - Use custom configurations to automatically set values for radio buttons and checkboxes in a PDF form. — [Video](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=JjCYGL2ff74)
  
- [Highlight all required fields](https://www.nutrient.io/playground?%%253D)
  - Mark all form fields as required, and visually highlight them using a custom renderer. — [Video](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=tt-C3Ps9gj4)
